name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

flavorText: Flies at high speed and attacks using the large, venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

strengths: Twineedle can deal up to 60 damage
counters: High HP Pokemon when Twineedle flips tails

description: Beedrill is a Stage 2 Grass-type Pokemon with free retreat cost. Twineedle offers variable damage based on coin flips, while Poison Sting can inflict Poison. Its Fighting resistance and free retreat make it mobile.
competitiveHistory: Beedrill saw limited play due to the coin-flip nature of Twineedle and the requirement of a full Stage 2 evolution. However, its free retreat cost made it occasionally useful as a mobile attacker.

rulings.ruling: Twineedle flips 2 coins. 0 heads = 0 damage, 1 head = 30 damage, 2 heads = 60 damage.
